The '''Inazuma Shrine of Depths Key''' is an Adventure Item which can be used to unlock the [[Shrines of Depths]] in [[Inazuma]], allowing players to access the [[chests]] inside. Keys do not correspond to specific shrines, meaning any key can be used to unlock any shrine in Inazuma.

There are ten Inazuma Shrine of Depths Keys obtainable, which allow the player to open all shrines in the [[Narukami Island]] ×2, [[Kannazuka]] ×2, [[Yashiori Island]] ×2, [[Seirai Island]] ×1, [[Watatsumi Island]] ×1 and [[Tsurumi Island]] ×2.
